long_description: The ultimate in cold-weather protection, these luxurious Swany gloves are built to handle the toughest ski runs year after year. Leather shells with reinforced palms marry the buttery softness of real leather with durability, excellent grip and fluid dexterity. Tri-plex(R) insulation is thicker on the back of the hand, thinner on the palms and stretches on the sidewalls, all to deliver optimal warmth. Fingers are anatomically curved for a natural, comfortable fit. Waterproof, breathable Dryfinger(R) II inserts keep hands dry. Premium linings wick moisture away from your skin and dry quickly for added comfort. Pockets with locking, water-resistant zippers are perfect for handwarmer heat packs. Leashes keep gloves attached to wrists when removed from hands. Gauntlets with fleece storm cuffs and quick-release straps keep the gloves in place and seal debris out.
short_description: The ultimate in cold-weather protection, these luxurious Swany gloves are built to handle the toughest ski runs year after year.
